item.title: BSc.CSIT - Books, Notes, & Old Questions | Pipara Academy
item.description: C Programming, Digital Logic, Math, Physics, OOP, Data Structures, Algorithms, OS, DB Management, AI, Multimedia, Web Tech, Ethics in IT, Cryptography, Software Eng, E-commerce, Robotics, Neural Networks, Java, Data Mining, Info Retrieval, Network Security, Cloud Computing, GIS, Mobile App Dev, Embedded Systems, Int'l Business Management.

item.title: Introduction To Information Technology - CSIT First Semesters | Pipara Academy
item.description: This course covers the basic concepts of computers and information technology including introduction, hardware, software, memory, input/output, data representation, database, networks and data communication, Internet, multimedia, and computer security.

item.title: Physics, Science - BSc. CSIT | Pipara Academy
item.description: Explore Rotational Dynamics, Oscillatory Motion, Electric and Magnetic Fields, Atomic Theory, Quantum Mechanics, Solid State Physics, Semiconductors, Semiconductor Devices, Universal Gates, and the Physics of Integrated Circuits. Learn about moment of inertia, torque, rotational kinetic energy, conservation of angular momentum, oscillation of spring, electromagnetic waves, Schrodinger theory, crystal structure, semiconductor diode, transistor, memory circuits, and more in CSIT First Semester.

item.title: Data Structures & Algorithms - Notes, Old Questions & More | Pipara Academy Online Education Center
item.description: Explore the fundamentals of data structures and algorithms including stacks, queues, recursion, linked lists, sorting, searching, hashing, trees, and graphs. Learn key concepts, operations, efficiency, and applications. Join now!

item.title: Numerical Methods - Notes, Old Questions | Pipara Academy
item.description: Master numerical methods for solving equations, interpolation, differentiation, integration, and more. Acquire theoretical and practical skills in numerical analysis for computer science and information technology. Join now!

item.title: Pipara Academy Online Education Center
item.description: Explore data representation, register transfer, microoperations, computer organization and design, microprogrammed control, CPU architecture, pipelining, computer arithmetic, input-output organization, and memory organization at Pipara Academy Online Education Center. Join now!

item.title: Pipara Academy Online Education Center
item.description: Explore the fundamentals of computer graphics including hardware, software, scan conversion algorithms, 2D and 3D geometric transformations, object representation, solid modeling, visible surface detection, illumination models, surface rendering techniques, virtual reality, and OpenGL. Join now!

item.title: Pipara Academy Online Education Center
item.description: Pipara Academy offers free online Courses, references and Notes in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - Introduction To Information Technology | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn about computer system hardware in this computer and information technology course. Explore the central processing unit, memory unit, instruction format, instruction set, instruction cycle, microprocessor, interconnecting the units of a computer, and the components inside a computer cabinet.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - Computer Memory | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn about computer memory in this computer and information technology course. Explore memory representation, memory hierarchy, CPU registers, cache memory, primary memory, secondary memory, access types of storage devices, and different types of storage media including magnetic tape, magnetic disk, optical disk, and magneto-optical disk.

item.title: Computer Input and Output Devices - CSIT First Semesters | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn about input and output devices in this computer and information technology course. Explore different input devices, output devices, and how the input/output system works.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - Data Representation | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn about data representation in this computer and information technology course. Explore number systems, binary, octal, and hexadecimal conversions, binary arithmetic, signed and unsigned numbers, binary data representation, binary coding schemes, and logic gates.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - Computer Software | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn about computer software in this computer and information technology course. Explore types of software, system software, application software, software acquisition, and operating systems including their introduction, objectives, types, functions, process management, memory management, file management, device management, protection and security, user interface, and examples of operating systems.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - Data Communication and Computer Network | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn about data communication and computer networks in this computer and information technology course. Explore the importance of networking, data transmission media, data transmission across media, computer networks, network types, network topology, communication protocols, network devices, and wireless networking.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - The Internet and Internet Services | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn the basic concepts of computers and information technology including hardware, software, memory, input/output, data representation, database, networks, data communication, Internet, multimedia, and computer security.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - Fundamentals of Database | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn the fundamentals of databases in this computer and information technology course. Explore database systems, database management systems, database architectures, database applications, data warehousing, data mining, and Big Data.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - Multimedia | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn about multimedia in this computer and information technology course. Explore the definition, characteristics, elements, and applications of multimedia.

item.title: CSIT First Semesters - Computer Security | Pipara Academy
item.description: Learn about computer security in this computer and information technology course. Explore security threats and attacks, malicious software, security services, and security mechanisms including cryptography, digital signatures, firewalls, user identification and authentication, intrusion detection systems, security awareness, and security policy.
